original_text: You must turn away from those very bad thoughts. Turn to the Lord and pray that he will forgive you. Then perhaps he will forgive you for these bad thoughts.
korean_text: 그러므로 너의 이 악함을 회개하고 주께 기도하라 혹 마음에 품은 것을 사하여 주시리라

sentences.original_text: You must turn away from those very bad thoughts.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그 매우 나쁜 생각들에서 떠나야 합니다.

sentences.original_text: and pray that he will forgive you.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 당신을 용서해 주시도록 기도하십시오.

sentences.original_text: Then perhaps he will forgive you
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 아마도 그가 당신을 용서해 줄 것입니다
